titles.title: A bill to authorize the interstate traffic of unpasteurized milk and milk products that are packaged for direct human consumption.
A bill to authorize the interstate traffic of unpasteurized milk and milk products that are packaged for direct human consumption.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Prohibits a federal department, agency, or court from taking any action that would prohibit, regulate, or otherwise restrict the interstate traffic of milk or a milk product that is unpasteurized and packaged for direct human consumption, if such restriction is based on the determination that solely because of being unpasteurized the milk or milk product is adulterated, misbranded, or otherwise in violation of federal law.
